verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

שִׁמְע֕וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> ye the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> of this covenant הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְדִבַּרְתָּם֙ <S%H1696><s%> and speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and to יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> and to the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> And say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> thou unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אָר֣וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [be] the man אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יִשְׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> that obeyeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> not the words הַבְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> of this covenant הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֣יתִי <S%H6680><s%> Which I commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֡ם <S%H1><s%> your fathers בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הוֹצִיאִֽי־ <S%H3318><s%> [that] I brought them forth אוֹתָ֣ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַיִם֩ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִכּ֨וּר <S%H3564><s%> furnace הַבַּרְזֶ֜ל <S%H1270><s%> from the iron לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> Obey בְקוֹלִי֙ <S%H6963><s%> my voice וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אֲצַוֶּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> them according to all which I command אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וִהְיִ֤יתֶם <S%H1961><s%> become לִי֙ לְעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> you so shall ye be my people וְאָ֣נֹכִ֔י <S%H595><s%> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> and I will be your God

לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> order הָקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> That I may perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁבוּעָ֜ה <S%H7621><s%> the oath אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> which I have sworn לַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> unto your fathers לָתֵ֤ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> them אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> flowing חָלָ֛ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבַ֖שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey כַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [it is] this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וָאַ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> Then answered וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> I and said אָמֵ֥ן ׀ <S%H543><s%> So be it יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Then the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me קְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> unto me Proclaim אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֤ים <S%H1697><s%> all these words הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֥וֹת <S%H2351><s%> and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying שִׁמְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> ye the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> of this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for הָעֵ֨ד <S%H5749><s%> For I earnestly הַעִדֹ֜תִי <S%H5749><s%> protested בַּאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> unto your fathers בְּיוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> in the day הַעֲלוֹתִ֨י <S%H5927><s%> [that] I brought them up אוֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [even] unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this הַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <S%H7925><s%> rising early וְהָעֵ֖ד <S%H5749><s%> and protesting לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> Obey בְּקוֹלִֽי׃ <S%H6963><s%> my voice

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> Yet they obeyed וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> or הִטּ֣וּ <S%H5186><s%> not nor inclined אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנָ֔ם <S%H241><s%> their ear וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <S%H1980><s%> walked אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one בִּשְׁרִיר֖וּת <S%H8307><s%> in the imagination לִבָּ֣ם <S%H3820><s%> heart הָרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> of their evil וָאָבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> therefore I will bring עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H5921><s%> and אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֧י <S%H1697><s%> upon them all the words הַבְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of this covenant הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֥יתִי <S%H6680><s%> which I commanded לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> [them] to do וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> to עָשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> but they did ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about נִֽמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> is found קֶ֙שֶׁר֙ <S%H7195><s%> unto me A conspiracy בְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> among the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבְיֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> and among the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

שָׁ֩בוּ֩ <S%H7725><s%> They are turned back עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto עֲוֹנֹ֨ת <S%H5771><s%> to the iniquities אֲבוֹתָ֜ם <S%H1><s%> with their fathers הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֗ים <S%H7223><s%> of their ancestors אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who מֵֽאֲנוּ֙ <S%H3985><s%> which refused לִשְׁמ֣וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> to hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרַ֔י <S%H1697><s%> my words וְהֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> and they הָלְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> and they went אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> other לְעָבְדָ֑ם <S%H5647><s%> to serve הֵפֵ֤רוּ <S%H6565><s%> have broken בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> them the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִ֕י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַ֖תִּי <S%H3772><s%> which I made אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> their fathers ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> Behold I will bring אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> upon them which they shall not be able לָצֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> to escape מִמֶּ֑נָּה <S%H4480><s%> they וְזָעֲק֣וּ <S%H2199><s%> and though they shall cry אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> unto me I will not hearken אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְהָֽלְכ֞וּ <S%H1980><s%> go עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> Then shall the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵי֙ <S%H3427><s%> and inhabitants יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְזָֽעֲקוּ֙ <S%H2199><s%> and cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> unto the gods אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> to whom הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they מְקַטְּרִ֖ים <S%H6999><s%> unto whom they offer incense לָהֶ֑ם וְהוֹשֵׁ֛עַ <S%H3467><s%> but they shall not save לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יוֹשִׁ֥יעוּ <S%H3467><s%> them at all לָהֶ֖ם בְּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> in the time רָעָתָֽם׃ <S%H7451><s%> of their trouble

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> are as מִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> For [according to] the number עָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H5892><s%> of thy cities הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> were thy gods יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> O Judah וּמִסְפַּ֞ר <S%H4557><s%> and [according to] the number חֻצ֣וֹת <S%H2351><s%> of the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem שַׂמְתֶּ֤ם <S%H7760><s%> have ye set up מִזְבְּחוֹת֙ <S%H4196><s%> altars לַבֹּ֔שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> to [that] shameful thing מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <S%H4196><s%> [even] altars לְקַטֵּ֥ר <S%H6999><s%> to burn incense לַבָּֽעַל׃ <S%H1168><s%> unto Baal ס

וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּתְפַּלֵּל֙ <S%H6419><s%> Therefore pray בְּעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> because הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> not thou for this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> he וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> neither lift up בַעֲדָ֖ם <S%H1157><s%> because רִנָּ֣ה <S%H7440><s%> a cry וּתְפִלָּ֑ה <S%H8605><s%> or prayer כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵינֶ֣נִּי <S%H369><s%> for שֹׁמֵ֗עַ <S%H8085><s%> for them for I will not hear בְּעֵ֛ת <S%H6256><s%> [them] in the time קָרְאָ֥ם <S%H7121><s%> that they cry אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> because רָעָתָֽם׃ <S%H7451><s%> unto me for their trouble ס

מֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What לִֽידִידִ֞י <S%H3039><s%> What hath my beloved בְּבֵיתִ֗י <S%H1004><s%> to do in mine house עֲשׂוֹתָ֤הּ <S%H6213><s%> [seeing] she hath wrought הַֽמְזִמָּ֙תָה֙ <S%H4209><s%> lewdness הָֽרַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> with many וּבְשַׂר־ <S%H1320><s%> flesh קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> and the holy יַעַבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> is passed מֵֽעָלָ֑יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> When רָעָתֵ֖כִי <S%H7451><s%> from thee? when thou doest evil אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> So תַּעֲלֹֽזִי׃ <S%H5937><s%> then thou rejoicest

זַ֤יִת <S%H2132><s%> olive tree רַֽעֲנָן֙ <S%H7488><s%> A green יְפֵ֣ה <S%H3303><s%> fair פְרִי־ <S%H6529><s%> fruit תֹ֔אַר <S%H8389><s%> [and] of goodly קָרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> called יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD שְׁמֵ֑ךְ <S%H8034><s%> thy name לְק֣וֹל ׀ <S%H6963><s%> with the noise הֲמוּלָּ֣ה <S%H1999><s%> tumult גְדֹלָ֗ה <S%H1419><s%> of a great הִצִּ֥ית <S%H3341><s%> he hath kindled אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> fire עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְרָע֖וּ <S%H7489><s%> of it are broken דָּלִיּוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1808><s%> upon it and the branches
